explanation: [0-0] A male chef in a black chef's uniform is standing outside a street shop. In front of him is a three-tiered metal rack with wheels and wooden boards on it. On the top tier of the rack is a large pot with a metal lid, next to it is a cutting board with a white plate of flatbread and a scallion. The chef is smiling and looking at the cutting board, one hand on the lid of the pot and the other holding a spatula. The shop sign has a white and red light box hanging on it.

[0-5] The chef smiles and removes the lid of the pot in front of him, revealing the mutton soaked in broth. Then the chef picks up a leg of lamb with a spatula, drains the broth from the leg of lamb, and places it on the plate of flatbread he is holding in his left hand.
